outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to address the root causes and potential consequences of non-transparent practices, enhance civic control in the fight against corruption and reinforce corruption control at local level.   This project supports the development of new tools and methodologies, including in particular the innovative methodology for measuring susceptibility to corruption at local level, a Code of Ethics for Local Government Officials adopted by all municipal councils and successful completion of the ISO certification process for quality management in the four target municipalities. 
Based on the developed tools and methodologies, the project is providing support to the State Commission for Prevention and Repression of Corruption for the development of the State Programme for Prevention and Repression of Corruption 2011-2015 and the related sectoral Action Plans.

project_title: Transparency and accountability at local level
